title: Lizzies of the field
creator_credit: Pathe Melody Comedies, Mack Sennett and Del Lord
brief_description: Two rival mechanics from competing garages, the Red Dog Garage and the Black Cat Garage, vie for the attention of the garage owner’s daughter. Their competition leads to them representing their respective garages in a 250 mile road race. Hijinks ensue as the villainous mechanic attempts to thwart the heroic mechanic. Features a spectacular multi-car pile up, some great stunts and lots of laughs. Cast includes Billy Bevan, Sidney Smith, Jack Lloyd, Barbara Pierce, John J. Richardson, Andy Clyde.
